Virial EoS¶

Ideal gas¶

Recommended when working at low pressure.

\[Z = \frac{Pv}{RT} = 1\]
ideal_gas(T, Tij, Pij, wij)[source]¶

Computes the virial coefficient for a mixture at given temperature for an ideal gas (Bij = 0)

Parameters:
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • Tij (array_like) – square array of critical temperatures
  • Pij (array_like) – square array of critical pressures
  • wij (array_like) – square array of acentric factor
Returns:

Bij – square array of virial coefficient
Return type:

array_like

Abbott - Van Ness¶

Correlation for the first virial coefficient, B:

\[\frac{BP_c}{RT_c} = B^{(0)} + \omega B^{(1)}\]

Where \(B^{(0)}\) and \(B^{(1)}\) are obtained from:

\[\begin{split}B^{(0)} &= 0.083 - \frac{0.422}{T_r^{1.6}}\\ B^{(1)} &= 0.139 + \frac{0.179}{T_r^{4.2}}\end{split}\]
Abbott(T, Tij, Pij, wij)[source]¶

Computes the virial coefficient for a mixture at given temperature with Abbott correlation

Parameters:
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • Tij (array_like) – square array of critical temperatures
  • Pij (array_like) – square array of critical pressures
  • wij (array_like) – square array of acentric factor
Returns:

Bij – square array of virial coefficient
Return type:

array_like

Tsonopoulos¶

Correlation for the first virial coefficient, B:

\[\frac{BP_c}{RT_c} = B^{(0)} + \omega B^{(1)}\]

Where \(B^{(0)}\) and \(B^{(1)}\) are obtained from:

\[\begin{split}B^{(0)} &= 0.1445 - \frac{0.33}{T_r} - \frac{0.1385}{T_r^ 2} - \frac{0.0121}{T_r^3} - \frac{0.000607}{T_r^8} \\ B^{(1)} &= 0.0637 + \frac{0.331}{T_r^2} - \frac{0.423}{T_r^ 3} - \frac{0.008}{T_r^8}\end{split}\]
Tsonopoulos(T, Tij, Pij, wij)[source]¶

Computes the virial coefficient for a mixture at given temperature with Tsonopoulos correlation

Parameters:
  • T (float) – absolute temperature in K
  • Tij (array_like) – square array of critical temperatures
  • Pij (array_like) – square array of critical pressures
  • wij (array_like) – square array of acentric factor
Returns:

Bij – square array of virial coefficient
Return type:

array_like
